r.s: Simple class for converting base set of numbers with a customizable character base set.
r.n:
The maximum number that can be used is different per platform. If your long (int4) integer is too short and your platform doesn't provide int8 (64-bit) integers, try converting your numbers to a double. Doubles are also 8-bytes. This way you can use int8 integers.
You may want to run the integer-test.php test script to check whether your platform supports int8.
